description: Hi! I'm Willian, and I'm passionate about games, technologies, and innovation. I have a deep love for all things gaming. And I also enjoy exploring new technologies and mechanics to create innovative and engaging experiences for players and users.

My expertise lies in designing and implementing game mechanics, AI systems, and UI/UX interfaces. I'm experienced in working with game engines, especially Unity, and have a solid understanding of programming languages such as C#.
My main goal is to develop games people can enjoy and learn. I'm constantly seeking to improve my skills and stay up-to-date with the latest trends in the industry.
In my free time, I enjoy playing games, challenging myself with code challenges, and collaborating with other developers on passion projects. Here are some technologies I know of:
